title: Define light in xacro and then attach light to link

content.raw:
Hi!

I'm trying to use the `AttachLightPlugin` to add a light to my robot. However it seems that I need to define the light in the world, before loading the robot model from a xacro. 

Is there a way I can define the light in the xacro file and load it on the fly?
